title: (6200) Covilhã - 1 Rua Francisco Rodrigues Taborda
description: Park in paved ground, lots of space, has a garden next if you climb the stairs and cross the train line. Very calm at night. Has recycling garbage near. Excellent for 1 night sleep, and if you want to walk the dog.

title: (6200-025) Covilhã - 5 Avenida 25 de Abril
description: Self Service laundry, during the day you can leave and pick up later. They have service of iron shirts and other clothes. I will put the prices later! Has WiFi! Not easy to park, but with some patience.

title: (6200) Covilhã -
description: Train station, free parking outside and free toilets, has a coffee shop inside. Big car park outside.

title: (6200) Covilhã - 4 Rua Vasco da Gama
description: Nice place to park, in the city at day or night. Near a green park (garden), with free toilet and free water, near cafés and restaurant. As two free elevator's to the center of city. Near post office and 5min away from shopping mall. 5min away by foot from selfservice laundry. The laundry as free wifi (near the court). Best place in the city.

title: (6200-197) Covilhã - 12 Rua Conde da Ericeira
description: Several parking lot spaces that belong to diferent public services - social services, schools and police station. It's empty on weekends and I suppose it's also empty on weekdays after labour hours. There are some places leveled others not so leveled. There's also a library around the corner open on weekdays from 10 to 18h30. 20 minute away walking (uphil) there's the city center.

title: (6200-051) Covilhã - LB Avenida Frei Heitor Pinto
title_short: (6200-051) Covilhã - LB Avenida Frei Heitor Pinto
description: Laundry Self Service dificult to park near, but in 5min on foot near the Fireman you have huge free place to park.

title: (6200) Covilhã - 37 Rua Doutor António Plácido da Costa
title_short: (6200) Covilhã - 37 Rua Doutor António Plácido da Costa
description: Very big free central park in city. With free Wc.

address.street: 37 Rua Doutor António Plácido da Costa

title: (6200-546) Covilhã - 7 Avenida do Anil
description: Big park behind the bus terminal and the park “Jardim do Lago”. Just to sleep. Has a coffee shop, bath room, ATM and playgrounds. One way park entrance in the bus terminal and exit for the train station.

title: (6200) Covilhã - 16 Rua Professor António Esteves Lopes
title_short: (6200) Covilhã - 16 Rua Professor António Esteves Lopes
description: Big Park under public summer swimming pool. Next to train and bus station, quiet at night. Toillets and a big garden. Selfservice laundry 5min away.

title: (6200) Covilhã - 56 Rua do Pinho Manso
description: Public park, serves also for a winter swimming pool, park is free, no noice but no services around. Far from city center, but it has a walking bridge and a free elevator to the city center. Playground is on the upper part near the school. The park is not flat, but it is silent and good to sleep. Upper in the road it is flat, and also good to park, long veicules, but it is near the road. There is a hike circuit passing here!

title: (6200-546) Covilhã - Rua Centro de Artes
description: Parking in public named “park of arts”, has wc in the top park of the park. Free WiFi but some times does not work. Calm and good for one night. Can play football, skate and little park for children.

title: (6200-505) Covilhã - 22 Rua Centro de Artes
description: Public park, with picnic tables. With free WiFi, public toilets, playground and lots of grass. Big parking for cars outside.

title: (6200) Covilhã - 2 Rua Viriato
description: Parking of a public park and a football field, can park until 72hour, it has a playground on the upper park, with football and kids equipment. The parking for cars is very large, but most of places are not flat, choice one good. The down part of the park, because it is divided in two is a public park to walk and picnic. Has hikes and bike tracks going up to the mountain. This is a windy place, at the top of the city (800m altitude), but great view.

title: (6200-507) Covilhã -
description: Famous park for big vans, the best park to go to the shopping center. It is a road inside of a residencial area, but safe and clean.

title: (6200) Covilhã - 2 Avenida Infante Dom Henrique
description: Place to park in a friendly Supermarket (Intermarche), very popular place to park for Caravan’s. It has a “Roady” (quick mechanic services and automobile pieces), and Bricomarche for brico stuff. It is very popular place for caravan’s to stop and sleep here. You can wash your car here of refuel your tank. They sell gas bottles to.

title: (6200) Covilhã - 4 Alameda da Europa
description: GPL fuel station, with every kind of bottles and pump. Has also diesel, it closes at 19h and it’s closed at lunch time, but it’s the only GPL pump station in 20km.

title: (6200-507) Covilhã - 2 Alameda Pêro da Covilhã
description: Parking in supermarket Lidl, very friend to park here day and night. It is also a parking for the hotel, so no problem at night. Lidl has a little cafe in the entrance very cheap for breakfast. Has fresh bread every hour. Toilet is inside supermarket.

title: (6200-507) Covilhã - Unnamed Road
description: Very big park at Athletic Stadium complex, has shower in the complex. The use of the complex is free and open till 24h with light. The park is free but it has not much around. It has a very good Sushi restaurant across the road. Parking for any size.

title: (6200-507) Covilhã -
description: Big park of stadium, big silence to sleep. Good view over the mountain. Good for one night.

title: (6200-507) Covilhã - R. do Bairro dos Caldeirões
title_short: (6200-507) Covilhã - R. do Bairro dos Caldeirões
description: Gravel car park at the end of the road, right by the football stadiums. It's pretty quiet at night. One is fast in the city.

title: (6200-221) Covilhã - 73 Rua 30 de Junho
description: Drinking water fountain, free and good to drink, or to fill tanks. It has a place to Wash your clothes (very commum in the area). Very large flow. You may need a hose.

title: (6200) Covilhã - N18
description: Self-Service laundry, with bath rooms, and a supermarket has also a pharmacy and a McDonalds!

title: () - N339
description: Parking next to the road. Toilets open during the day. Very nice shaded picnic area with games for children. Drinking water is in the picnic area.

title: (6200-027) Covilhã - 2B Rua Humberto Delgado
description: Picnic area with free barbecue. Park in front in the supermarket were it has also free Wi-Fi and WC.

title: (6200) Covilhã - Caminho da Rosa Negra
description: Very knowledgeable place for locals for hikes and bike tracks, motorbike good here too. It is a good place to stay for one night, flat terrain inside nature. This place is called “Rosa Negra”, black rose!

title: (6200) - N339
description: Free water, near a maintenance circuit (or hikes) It is very popular with in the locals, good water all year for free. It is on the right of the road when coming down the mountain. Has park for 1 or two cars at one time. Good to walk the dogs too!

title: (6200) Covilhã - 12 Rua Humberto Delgado
description: Fuel station (low cost), with free-WiFi, has Coffee shop, little supermarket, bathroom, place to park, walk the dog, water, and free pressure check for tires. Has a big supermarket in 50m. Good stop, has place to park any size.

name: Camping Piao
title: (6200) Camping Piao
description: Camping Piao. Small friendly campsite with swimming pool. Sanitary facilities a little outdated but we have seen worse. The people are really nice. Outside city but inside the mountain. Altitude 900m. Has recycling garbage. Mountain bike trails near.

title: (6200) Covilhã - Estrada Eixo Teixoso Canhoso Tortosendo
title_short: (6200) Covilhã - Estrada Eixo Teixoso Canhoso Tortosendo
description: Picnic tables next to the road. Has shade of trees. Park in longitude next to the road.  Lot’s of caravan stop here to Lunch.

title: (6200-073) Covilhã - N339
description: Viewpoint at an altitude of 1050 m over the city. Called ”Miradouro da Varanda dos carquejais” important view point of the valley “Cova da Beira”, check more in internet. 8 places to park any van. Has a water point, garbage and mountain bike trails around.

title: (6200) - 1 Rua do Bairro dos Freixos
description: Big park, far from city, little stream, a café, free gimn, and lots of places to sport (basket, volley, and football). A little noise at night, near IP2 road. A lot of trees.

title: (6200-073) Covilhã - Unnamed Road
description: Panoramic view of the plains. Quiet location on the edge of the road very little passing but passable on a path. It's a very good spot. No convenience. Remember to take your trash, stay clean!

title: (6200-823) Tortosendo -
description: Park in train station, very calm not trains from 23h to 6am. Flat terrain with no noise at night.

title: (6215) Cortes do Meio - N339
description: Normal parking inside the little village of Penhas da Saude. Very quiet and nature near by. Good for 1 or 2 days. Walking places and mountain trails. Bar and restaurant less than 2min on foot. For all sizes of van. Altitude 1550m it's a mountain place to park and sleep. To eat we recommend "Casa do Clube" restaurant. They have quick and not expenside meals, tapas and good wine!

title: (6215) Cortes do Meio - N339
description: Free parking inside the village, flat and sunny. Calm but with no services.

title: (6215) Cortes do Meio - N339
description: Good place to park, free but with no services. Very calm in the village.

title: (6200) Teixoso - Rua Carlos Mourão, Terlamonte
description: Nice farm near Serra da Estrela, with mountain view. Electricity, internet and shower (best mosaic shower ever!) available for a small fee. Great area to explore - host knows the area very well and can help. Not a commercial place, so no official opening hours. To ask access, please contact phone number available to Pro users.

title: (6215) Cortes do Meio - 29 Rua dos Carqueijais
title_short: (6215) Cortes do Meio - 29 Rua dos Carqueijais
description: Large park inside little village inside mountain reserved park at 1500m altitude. Good quiet place inside nature.

title: (6200) Teixoso - CM1014
description: Picnic table, shady and quiet, trash bin and water.

title: (6215) Cortes do Meio - N339
description: Place to park day or night. Free parking and free water, public toilet, garbage. There is a restaurant nearby. At altitude of 1500m a lot of nature. Good place to sleep and walk in the day. Picnic place with tables and good view of the mountain.

title: (6215) Cortes do Meio - Rua Nave da Areia
title_short: (6215) Cortes do Meio - Rua Nave da Areia
description: This was a famous swimming poll in the 70’s but it was renovated in 2020. In has place to park at least 5 van’s but is is not flat. You can sleep 50m away. Has a famous restaurant next door. Good place for the day. In the national park at altitude 1550m. Water a little bit cold. Swim till 15 September.

title: (6200-760) Tortosendo - 3 Estrada da Ladeirinha
description: Parking in the city park of Tortosendo, not much to see except the view of the big mountain. Very quiet and park for any size. Good for one night.

title: () - E802
description: In the middle of the vineyards, splendid view. branches limit the height.

title: (6215) Cortes do Meio - N339
description: Very nice stop along the road but facing a dam. You can spend the night there, close to restaurants. very quiet place.

title: (6200) Tortosendo - Unnamed Road
description: Picnic area of “CABEÇO REDONDO”, a lot of nature. It’s near the village of Tortosendo in a forest of pine trees. Good for the day or night. Parking for 2 or 3 big vans only.

title: (6215) Cortes do Meio - N339
description: A flat space next to the road. Beautiful view over the lake. Easy accessible, room for 5 moterhomes.

title: (6215-151) Cortes do Meio - R. do Sítio da Tapada
title_short: (6215-151) Cortes do Meio - R. do Sítio da Tapada
description: Place for 3 or 4 vans. A little lean. Silent. At the end of a small road, not accessible for large vehicles.

title: () - N339
description: Parking lot with wonderful views and views of a wonderful night sky. Certainly also good for exploring and hiking in the area.

title: (6215) Cortes do Meio - N339
description: Parking near the old and deactivated telepheric a lot of space on the abandoned park, free parking and nature. No services near by only nature. Only building is the Center of Snow Cleaning. Only service is the garbage. The view is super to the mountain!

title: (6215) Cortes do Meio -
description: A gravel and a tarmac car park near the only ski resort in Portugal. The place is at the ruins of the cable car. On one side the beautiful view of the Torre, on the other a small reservoir. The road is close but no traffic at night.

title: () - N339
description: Source of water, against the bottom of the parking of the old cable car, not visible from the road. Find on the trek back, Thank you Santo Antonio for the cat toilet and drinking water. Well put the big basin if you move it allows the cow to drink.

title: (6260) São Pedro - N338
description: A bit of the main road is this small place suitable for a van sheltered from the wind. Splendid view of the mountains and situated directly on the hiking route. No services and unfortunately a bit of trash but not too bad.

title: (6270) Loriga - Unnamed Road
description: Quiet parking lot surrounded by nature. No prohibition signs. Only birdsong :)

title: (6215) Unhais da Serra - Nave de Santo António
title_short: (6215) Unhais da Serra - Nave de Santo António
description: Good for passing the blow. non-potable water nearby.

title: (6260) - N338
description: Small source

title: (6270) Loriga -
description:
Large parking spot just a bit ahead of the two other spots indicated on the same road, even more flat and with a great view on the valley and the town of Manteigas. Space for
 2/3 small vans. We had a calm night, even though some passersby in the afternoon and evening. From this point one can hike down the road towards the cascate of Poço de Inferno and eventually Manteigas. Alternatively there is are nice hikes from the picknick spot down the road, called Covão d'Ametade. On the way to that spot there is an amazing water fountain!

title: (6215) Cortes do Meio - M508
description: Municipal car park, overnight parking authorized. Quiet place with view on the valley.

title: (6260) São Pedro - N338
description: Fresh spring water fountain

title: (6230) Alcaria - 2 Rua da Nossa Senhora das Necessidades
title_short: (6230) Alcaria - 2 Rua da Nossa Senhora das Necessidades
description: Good park next to the river, with playground, calm at night, with swimming in summer.

address.street: 2 Rua da Nossa Senhora das Necessidades

title: (6215) Unhais da Serra -
description: Spot by the side of the road but quiet. No vehicle at night. Flat terrain

title: (6200) - EM501
description: Parking along the road. All nature around! Good to sleep 1 day, area in forest no services. Flat terrain for small or big vans.

title: (6200) Sarzedo - EM501
description: Big point of view, called roundabout of Sarzedo. It is a part of the circuit of Portugal tour on bike, and it is a point of departure of hikes.

title: (6260) R. do Rio Zêzere - N338
description: Natural spot next to a river and in the middle of the glacial valley. No service. Wild camping is prohibited.

title: (6260) - N338
description: No trash. Lost in the Zêzere valley. Small river, clear, cool water, jump possible. Great accessibility (motor home, caravan etc.) Drive slowly to find the path to the right of the main axis.

title: (6200) - N18
description: A park to stop with a Fountain, and a little table to eat, next to the road. Park, fill water, eat and drive...

title: (6230) - IP2
description: Rest area in highway A23, near Fundão, Diesel, Gas (GPL and bottle) Water. A lot of tradicional artifacts and traditional food. Good coffe! Quiet to sleep one night.

title: (6215) Paul -
description: Well isolated corner of the river. Follow the road that leads to the house "casa do pantano" and cut directly into the first field. Cross it diagonally to take the rocky climb at the end of the house. A little perilous path, we did it in a van, impossible in a motorhome. But it's totally worth the effort, swimming alone in the world!

title: (9FFM+39W) Manteigas - Poço do Inferno
description: Carpark next to the Poço do Inferno (know as Hell’s Well), this is a plunge pool at the foot of a 10m waterfall which pours down into a small dark pool. Suitable for swimming (autumn to spring is best as the waterfall is in flow). Also a circular, signed 2.5 km walk leads from the waterfall though woodland and along various streams. Well worth the walk.                               The parking is on the edge of the quite road and is reasonable flat. Picnic benches and a spring are nearby to be enjoyed. Note the road is quite narrow and may not be suitable for larger motorhomes. Hope you enjoy and please respect this special place. View isn’t half bad too.

title: (6215) Paul -
description:
Nice riverbeach and space for parking. Its at the road so not very quiet, but ok at night. The river is clear and cold also in summer. 
if you walk a bit upstream there is a small hidden beach.
No services.

title: (6200) Sarzedo - EM501
description: Called the top of “Sarzedo” mountain, inside of the Natural park of Serra da Estrela. It is very calm only nature. Little place to park inside the woods. Very known road because of cycling (Tour of Portugal).

title: () Torre - Rua dos Mercadores
description: In Torre, the highest point in Portugal, in the heart of the Estrella Park. Parking on top of a ski resort possible start of hikes, some shops. A restaurant. Overnight stay possible out of ski season. The view upon awakening is enchanting.

title: (6200) Verdelhos -
description: Calm and quiet place. Pure and fresh water

title: (6215) Unhais da Serra - Avenida Primeiro de Maio
title_short: (6215) Unhais da Serra - Avenida Primeiro de Maio
description: Wooded picnic area with plenty of shade at the entrance of Unhais. There is a water fountain, toilets, a RV area and a greywater drainage point.

title: (6215) Unhais da Serra - 15 Rua da Junta de Freguesia
title_short: (6215) Unhais da Serra - 15 Rua da Junta de Freguesia
description: Restrooms, chemical dump, BBQ, camping ground, outdoor shower, tap water, wash down sink, swimming by the stream, not mote[all free]. A coffee shop next door. Amazing views. big little village

title: (6200) Sarzedo - 8 Largo Augusto Lopes
description: Little park with water, place to sit and park. Good view, in small mountain town.

title: (6250-111) Catraia da Caria - 20 Rua dos Eucaliptos
title_short: (6250-111) Catraia da Caria - 20 Rua dos Eucaliptos
description: Nice and calm place, parking of a train station. Space for 4 to 6 vans, quiet.

title: (6250-111) Caria - 22 Rua Fonte do Ruivo
description: Free water fountain, good to drink and good to fill up the tank, has access, next to the road for any size of van. Good view! Next to a Service Staion with good price on diesel. Good stop on the way to Spain, and near Old Historic Villages route.

title: (6250-111) Caria - 35 Rua da Lage da Sobreira
title_short: (6250-111) Caria - 35 Rua da Lage da Sobreira
description: Good parking to sleep, has garbage can. Good view to the mountain. Had a fountain of water very near with free water to fill the tank. Has a playground for kids!

title: (6250-111) Caria - 28 Bairro Santa Ana
description: Free water, good to drink. Has garbage recycling container’s. Calm area.

title: (6250) Caria - 2 Rua José Luís Rebelo
description: Very good parking area in service station. Has free water, and pump, has car wash, a café shop for eat or drink some think, fuel, and big parking. To stop or sleep one night. The view of the mountain is wonderful. Toilet very clean. People very nice. Park in size with from 5.15m and 5un. With places up to 12m long.

title: (6270) Loriga - N339
description: Park not far from ski resort, it is not big but only nature around. The park is flat and pavement is in asfalt.

title: (6260) Manteigas - N338
description: Nice picnic place with tables and benches. Small fountain with spring water, directly by the stream

title: (6260) Manteigas - Caldas de Manteigas
description: Parking near caldas de Manteignas and thermal baths. Good for one night. Possibility of hiking and sport fishing. No service but close city. Sounds of the river and birdsongs on waking.

title: (6230) - Unnamed Road
description:
Free parking under big trees.
not so quiet on weekends.
small café, toilets and showers close by.

title: (6215-768) Coutada - 3 Rua da Independência
description:
We have 5 parking spots on a beautiful permaculture farm with olive trees, sheep and chickens.

The whole land is fenced with walls and trees so you'll be safe. We have a simple compost toilet on the campsite and the shower is in the main house. 
Because we recycle our waste water we ask you to only use biodegradable soaps (you can borrow ours). 
The parking spots are nearly level so with blocks under the wheels you'll get a good result.

You're welcome to have a look around, learn about permaculture or perhaps get some fresh eggs in the morning from our free range rescue chickens.

Dogs are not allowed! Our chickens run free and there have been problems even with otherwise very friendly dogs.

The days can get hot in the summer, but the mountain provides cool air and it's still nice and chilly at night for you to sleep well, even in the middle of summer.

We ask a contribution per night that will go straight to planting more tees or other things to give back to the land :)

The area:
- Bakery, village store - 2 min walk
- River for swimming - 5 min walk
- Hiking - 10 min
- Cascades - 15 min drive
- Serra da Estrela Nature Park - 1 hour drive

title: (6260) - Unnamed Road
description: Under trees with a great view!

title: (6270) Loriga -
description: Place in the middle of nature NO passage 360 view access to the van or 2-seater van

title: (6200-501) Aldeia do Souto - 7 Rua da Maria Janeira
title_short: (6200-501) Aldeia do Souto - 7 Rua da Maria Janeira
description: Great fountain of drinkable water. Romans were here before and mapped it before I did. Large flow of water. All free with park for one or two cars.

name: Parque de Campismo Rural Vale do Beijames
title: (6300) Parque de Campismo Rural Vale do Beijames
title_short: (6300) Parque de Campismo Rural Vale do Beijames
description: The vale do beijames rural camping site is located in one of the most spectacular valleys of the serra da estrela, at 540 meters altitude, ideal for camping and access to the highest and most interesting points of the mountain, little explored. Located a few meters from the river beijames, between the village of vale de amoreira (manteigas) and verdelhos (covilhã), in a magnificent space from which you can get a whole magnitude that impresses, especially the agro-pastoral mosaic, still with open activity traditional. The area reserved for campers is dominated by a small woodland, with hardwoods and a variety of more than 60 species of trees. ​ it is the ideal place to enjoy the best moments and take the best memories of the serra da estrela.

title: (6230) Fundão - Rua Sítio da Areeira
description: Wash your caravan here, the best around the area, has good pressure and good price. Very good view over the mountain. The owner speaks very well French (he lived there). Water in the fuel station (good pressure). You can sleep in the park of supermarket. ATM in the supermarket. Everything here is very calm. Supermarket has fuel to.

title: (6270) Lagoa da -
description: Natural wonder COVAO DOS CONCHOS This extraordinary lake can only be reached on foot with good shoes. We looked for a parking space nearby and the next day we went on foot in search of this incredible natural wonder. This excursion is worthwhile for all nature lovers.

title: (6250) Belmonte -
description: Picnic area with bins and a few tables. Close to Belmonte (4min by car). Under pines. A small road passes below.

title: (6230-527) Capinha - Unnamed road
description: Parking at the entrance to the village of Capinha 3 places, village at 300 m with bar, small store Public WC at 2 km, a dam with a leisure center for swimming possible

title: (6215) Paul - N343-1
description: Place to park with a beautiful place to swim. River with a little River Bar. And a barbecue

title: (6260) Manteigas - 2 Rua da Matufa
description: Ground parking area. with WC. Good place day and night. No height problem

title: (6260) Manteigas - Rua 1 de Maio
description: Parking place for smaller campers limited in height. Calm place near church and Municipality house, plenty of restaurants in a walking distance. Take the left entrance as only this one is suitable for campers ~ 3m.

title: (6300) Manteigas - N232
description: Nice quiet place, by the river. The road is close without being glued. Ok for the kids so. Easy access.

title: (6230) Fundão - 6 N18
description: Fuel station (new) Repsol, with GPL, fresh bread in Lidl (in front) or Continente Supermarket (next), has BricoMarche also in front. In the beginning of bike tracks in and of the city.

title: (6215-439) Paul - 16 Rua da Ponte
description: Great place with a river to swim, a little River Bar with great view.

title: (6270) Alvoco da Serra - 3 Rua do Bairro da Corte de Soito
title_short: (6270) Alvoco da Serra - 3 Rua do Bairro da Corte de Soito
description: Alvoco da Serra, parking place overlooking the village. Possibility to spend the night. It has a very clean water source. Swimming pool at 300m. Ideal for mountain walks. Very special place...watch out for the automatic watering system...

address.street: 3 Rua do Bairro da Corte de Soito

title: (6230-346) Fundão - 30 Rua Cidade da Covilhã
description: Laundry in the Intermarche hypermarket parking lot.

title: (6230) Valverde - 9 Estrada Municipal
description: Car park on the outskirts of the village. Beautiful views. Prefect for a nights stop. Safe with street lights. Very quiet nights sleep. No facilities, except bins.

title: (6215-439) Paul - 16 Rua da Ponte
description: Great place with barbecue. Beautiful river to swim. Water to refresh and full little recipients. we can park here and stay a night it's so calm and quiet. It's a nice place to see with bicycles. it's a 2 minutes from both "P" on the map and 5 minutes from the other "TREE". We can visit this places always with bicycle or just walk

title: (6215) Paul - 19 Travessa do Mercado
description:
Beautiful place in the center of an historical village named Paul. with a great garden to take a pause with animals, or eat.
Place with free water to drink or full the caravan's deposits.
Bar with free wi-fi.
Here it's localized the simpatic GNR ("police station") and the greats FIREFIGHTER ("firemans"), and a Multibank (we never know)

title: (6260) - N232
description: Superb place by the river to spend the night, 300m from a campsite. Small path down a paved road. Very little passage

title: (6215) Paul - 76 Estrada do Santuário
description: Great area called Santuario (religion place). Calm and quite place. Good to park day and night. To do a picnic with a barbecue. And wc.

title: (6230) Aldeia Nova do Cabo -
description:
Calm and pleasant place, with lots of space. good for those who like to watch birds as there are many species in the riverside area. you can go for a walk or cycling and enjoy the scenery. 
City of Fundão ​​5 min by car and 30 min walking, village of Telhado and Aldeia de Joanes 15 min walk with mini market, coffee shop and ATM,restaurants. Fantastic river beaches in the area. Everything you need on a short distance. It's possible to share the electricity from the house if you have the electric extensions. 

Gate is always open, park where you want and I will be with you as soon as possible. Thanks

name: Grass Reboleira
title: (6260) Grass Reboleira
description: Lovely campground next to a river with riverside beach bar, bbq facilities, free wifi, canoe rental and zip lining.

title: (6260) Sameiro - EN 232
description: Parking lot with beautiful hiking trails. Not far away there is a natural swimming pool and a small bar that is closed in October. Not too much shade, but there are a few trees at the end of the parking lot.

title: (6250-085) Belmonte - Bairro Do Castiçal
description: Belmonte. New parking area. Free, non services, walking distance from the city center.

title: (6250-073) Belmonte -
description: Excellent park near train station of city of Belmonte. Has playground, free water, free barbecue, and a big park (any size) to stay.

title: () - Unnamed Road
description: Place in full nature near the dam of vale do rossim. Quiet and cool night on the heights. perfect. Fountain and possibility to swim at the dam. Bar very good restaurant.

title: (6250-056) Belmonte - 129 Largo Bombeiros Voluntários
description: Clean and beautiful car park with stone tables and superb views over the valley.

title: (6250-062) Belmonte - Parque Bus Belmonte
description: Nice and new parking lot. Spacious and quiet, with an excellent view to Serra da Estrela. Nice tables near the parking spaces. No shadow. Close to 3 museums and not far from the centre. No services but water fountain.

title: (6250) Caria - Unnamed Road
description: Park near little “Monte do Bispo” dam, you can fish, hikes along the water Chanel or bike and motorbike. I would not recommend to swim. Nice view to Serra da Estrela mountain. Good for one or two nights of pure nature!

title: () Vale de Amoreira - 40 N232
description: Parking with a great view of the Serra de Estrela.

title: (6230) Fundão - 23 Rua Cidade da Covilhã
description: Fuel station with GPL and bottles gas, AdBlue, Diesel and Gasoline, also a great view of the mountain Serra da Estrela. It has water but pressure is not good, you can see the tires and go to the excellent bakery in front of the police. Good for a quick pitstop!

title: (6230) Fundão - 117 Rua Fernando Pessoa
description: Public Green park. Calm at night. Central zone for walking in the old part of the city.

title: () - Rua da Fonte do Serro
description: Great place. Vale do rossim. Lake for swimming, super clear water. Opportunities for canoeing and paddle boating. Snack. There is also a campsite.

title: (6290) Manteigas -
description:
Very nice spot in the Serra d'Estrel.
Shaded morning and evening depending on where you park.
Beautiful pine forests, nice path around the lake and the dam. Quiet night.

title: (6270) São Romão - N339
description: Nice location in the Serra de Estrela, near a large reservoir.

title: (6230) Fundão - 33 Avenida Eugénio de Andrade
description: Laundry Self Service, has place to park a big van a little down the road.

title: (6250-037) Belmonte - 168 Rua Pedro Álvares Cabral
description: Car park very close to castle. Too steep for overnight but fine to park

title: (6250-047) Belmonte - 9 Largo São Tiago
description: Park in the castle of Belmonte home of Pedro Álvares Cabral who discovered Brasil, and home of the most important historic Jewish village in Portugal. The park has 5 or 6 places flat, but the rest is not so flat. Excellent view of the mountain Serra da Estrela, could be windy and cold in winter. Free park and for to visit historic center and the 3 museums.

title: (6230-219) Fundão - 17 Rua de Haapsalu
description: Self-service Laundry pay by money or card. Wi-Fi available. All clean. Park around during week days and work time is difficult.

title: (6270) São Romão - N339
description: Location for 2 or 3 light motorhomes! Magnificent view over the valley close to hiking (buraco) and swimming possible! Quiet after departure of the tourists! shopkeeper (cheese and chorizo) at 100 m

name: Vale do Rossim Eco resort
title: (6260) Vale do Rossim Eco resort
description: Vale do Rossim Eco resort with campground, near a lake in Serra da Estrela. The campground has lots of shade, parcels not delimited. Has bathrooms, barbeques and sinks.

title: (6270) São Romão - 6270 N339
description: Mooi plek nabij Lago Comprida. Zie geen bord dat t verboden is om te overnachten. Nabij souvenirrswinkel. Geen voorzieningen. Je kunt er een mooi wandeling maken naar Corvâo dos Concros, een kunstmatig stuwmeertje ongeveer 6 km vandaan.

title: (6270) São Romão - N339
description: Large gravel parking at the edge of the road. Great view, fantastic sunset. The sunrise is not bad either! You can easily get off the road. No service. Let's stay clean!

title: (6230-350) Fundão - 33 Rua Loteamento Rebordão
description: Good place to park together the business center, the municipal garden, the library.

name: Casa Na Floresta
title: (6230-180) Casa Na Floresta
description:
A peaceful and lovely campsite. If you are looking for a place to chill and be surrounded with nature this is the place. There is a place for one or two campers up to 7m. Easy access and flat. The toilets and showers are 100m walk nice and clean. there is a fully featured kitchen with everything you need to prepare a hot meal. a washing machine is here as well.
important! Please contact before showing up :)

title: (6260) Manteigas -
description: Beautiful spot by the road to stop overnight, amazing 360 degrees view at the top of the rocks. Insuperable for stargazing. Can get a bit windy. No services.

name: Valhelhas Camping
title: (6300) Valhelhas Camping
description: Camping site of Valhelhas, has little bit of everything Big free swimming pool, of the river Zezere, has electricity and shade. It is a Mountain camping.

title: (6300) Vale de Amoreira - 10 Rua Direita
description: Free and very quiet public car park with about 40 spaces, next to a sports field and a playground. It does not offer services, but it is ideal for a one-day stop.

title: (6270) Loriga - N231
description: great place for a motorhomes, near to Loriga river beach.

title: (6270) Loriga - N231
description:
Only 2 or 3 places to stop the camper !
To get the place you need to go at night !
It´s the special place that everyone wants !
5O meters from the river beach of Loriga !
On the river beach you have :
-toilet 
-trash cans 
And you are at 500meters from village center .

title: (6260) Manteigas - Unnamed Road
description: Ideal start or end of beautiful Rando, 2 beautiful loops start from this pass. Starry sky, very little passage on the nearby road. Possibility to put van in the shade of pines.

title: (6230-215) Fundão - 11 Rua Cândido dos Reis
description: Laundry self-service, open every day till 22h.

title: (6250-020) Belmonte - Varanda Pilatos Belmonte
description: Laundry and one dryer.

title: (6230) Fundão - 24 Rua do Registo
description: Park near city center, in summer swimming is possible inside the park that is in front. It has a dirty road that leaves from here inside the Gardunha mountain. It’s the beginning of a famous hike track and a lot of btt bike tracks end here. No services except garbage, but a cafe and a restaurant near. You a ATM in 5min on foot. Free park and big for all kind of vans. Nice view to Gardunha mountain.

title: (6260) Manteigas -
description: Parking next to the road on gravel. At the beginning of June surrounded by yellow gorse. Great all-round view. Might be pretty windy. No service, but pure nature!

title: (6270-011) Vasco Esteves de Baixo - N231
description: Picnic area with tables and shade. Good views of the valley

title: (6270) Loriga - N231
description: Secondary parking park in Loriga (ex. Soccer field). Boas views local sossegado with enough space. Perto da praia fluvial. Optimal to passar a noite. A little acidentate access.

title: (6300-235) Valhelhas - 6300 Rua Eduardo Duarte
description: Drinking water fountain next to a bar and in a square, bread delivery at 11 a.m.

title: (6270) Loriga -
description:
At the foot of the watchtower, a magnificent place with a superb view.
Let's stay discreet and let's not spoil nature.

title: (6250-076) Belmonte - Rua da Amoreira
description:
Santiago Park, Belmonte.
A bit noisy, since the bus stop and parking lot are right next to it, as well as the busy N345 thoroughfare. Disposal & water free. Paved, level surface.
Toilet & shower unfortunately closed due to vandalism. 500 m from the village, restaurant opposite.

name: Parque de Campismo do Fundão
title: () Parque de Campismo do Fundão
description: A good place In the convent park. Out of season. Many routes but without information. Correct reception

title: (6290) Nascente do Rio Mondego - N232
description: Source of Mondego. Small picnic area (2 granite tables) and fountain with delicious spring water.

title: (6270) Loriga - Avenida Padre António R. A. Prata
title_short: (6270) Loriga - Avenida Padre António R. A. Prata
description: Parking place right in front of the school. Recommended to us by the people at the fire department. It's easy to get there and it very close to the centre. There is room for 4/5 camping cars. Loriga is a wonderful village with very friendly people and amazing river pools! Great for kids!

address.street: Avenida Padre António R. A. Prata

title: (6270-102) Loriga - 1 Rua do Porto
description: Regato Park. In front of the school. Area for 4 motorhomes. Water filling and emptying services. Sewage too. It is new and unfinished.

title: (6270) Loriga - R. de São Sebastião
description: Very pleasant parking  in front of a cemetery and small chapel! Very shady under big trees and with a great view of the village of Loriga and all its assets. Is frequented by local residents.

title: (6270) Loriga - Unnamed Road
description: Place in nature for picnics or for the night. Amazing views.

title: (6230) Alcongosta - 24 Rua dos Candais
description: Free park  for all kind of vans. Ideal for visitting cherries house museum and the village of Alcongosta. In the village are cafes and MB.

title: (6270) Loriga - Unnamed Road
description: Picnic spot on the way up to the top. Great views down below towards the west with amazing sunset Sheltered from the north wind. Tables, water and bins provided. Very quiet road at night, no traffic at all.

title: (6285) - N231
description: Drinkable water

title: (6270) Sabugueiro - 13 Rua da Rua Beirinha
description: Flat parking near the chapel, grocery bar and restaurant a few meters, very welcoming and very friendly people. Perfect parking in the mountains and near homes, safe.

title: (6230) - Rua da Argemela
description: One of the best river swimming pools in the area. Free barbecue and free toilets. Park with grass and good facilities. All free except from bar/restaurant. Excelent for the summer. Swimming is possible from  mid June to mid September on summer holidays. Picnic area is good.

title: (6250-075) Belmonte - Quinta da Bica,EN 18 Km 19,4
description: Private Car Park for Campers - Eco Lodge Camping with individual electric hook-up and water, grey water and toilet disposal, large individual area, free WiFi, in a golf course area with access to the bar and fitness center, in a beautiful landscape area.  Free puttingreen. Address: Quinta da Bica, EN 18 Km 19,4 - 6250-075 Belmonte - Phone available to Pro subscribers.

title: (6230) - Caminho da Casa do Guarda
description: Top of Gardunha mountain, it is also called “Mountain Guard House”. Very nice with big trees and a lot of hike places, bike btt is also very good. Good place to sleep, but I saw no services! The road is not big and big vans will have some difficulty to reach here. But van till 6m it is excellent.

title: (6285) Seia - N231
description: "Pedras Lavradas" coffee shop / restaurant located at 885 meters above sea level and at the intersection of the N230 / N231. The place is exposed to winds but it is possible to spend the night. The restaurant is of good quality and very competitive in terms of price. No service but satellite reception is optimal. However the 4G is non-existent and the telephone network is very perfectible. Nevertheless in the establishment you benefit from a secure and excellent Wi-Fi network at the same time with the password "pedraslavradas" without the quotation marks.

title: (6270) Seia -
description: Path perpendicular to the small road that leads to the n339 road in the direction of sabugeiro. Extremely quiet. No services. Very beautiful view

title: (6270) Seia -
description: Compared to other areas close by, this layby offered us very good shelter from the wind. Pretty leveled, too.

title: (6230) Alpedrinha - N18
description: Fresh water fountain very old (1873) and well known by locals, even on N 18 road, together with one stone picnic table and seats and extended panorama over planes Southern of Gardunha mountain. Not convenient to fill motorhome tank. Traveling S to N, 100m ahead you can reverse.

title: (6270) - Unnamed Road
description: In addition to the road a small parking area with breathtaking views. In October a very quiet place, hardly any traffic.

title: (6270) - N231
description: Space for about 10 vehicles next to dirt track that runs parallel to the road. Accessible road for any vehicle with a little care. There are no services or tables, just below there is a pool.

title: (6230) Alpedrinha - N18
description: Free flat gravel P behind chapel, aside N 18 road but on a little higher level. Alternative if two suggested places in Alpedrinha village are not available. Swimming pool open in Summer. Good point to sun rising watch.

title: (6270-021) Cabeça - 3 Avenida da Independência da Freguesia
title_short: (6270-021) Cabeça - 3 Avenida da Independência da Freguesia
description: Never go through "Muro", the road is bad, not good for "We". We went to see the Christmas village of Cabeça and at the beginning of the road that leads there, there is a sign that says it is temporarily closed and therefore, cross it, no worries! It is a sloping ground! It is 500 m from the city but it is very quiet! And there is an incredible view!

title: (6225-119) Casegas - 1 Rua da Quelhinha
description: Picnic area, with 5 tables and swimming zona in the river.

title: (6230-066) Alpedrinha - Rua da Estação
description: Free public P, unleveled (!) without parking lines on larger side and in line along municipal road (low night traffic). Near nice historic village center. It is good place for one night but look for the other.

name: Alpedrinha, Largo de Santo António.
title: (6230) Alpedrinha, Largo de Santo António.
description: Free public flat P convenient for vehicles up to 7m, illuminated, inside nice historic village and 75m away from N 18 road, providing quiet night. Good starting point for monuments and hiking. Nice sun rising. Toilets are at lower level.

title: (6270) Seia - Rua da Eira
description: Semi stabilized area, shaded, away from the road and overlooking the valley. The view is exceptional at 180 °. Picnic tables, no service but optimal satellite and 4G reception. A nice place for a cool bivouac! Be careful, however, to the possible nuisance caused by the kennel located at about fifty meters.

title: (6270) Seia - 6270 N339
description: Water point named in the post in the car park next door but to be able to locate it easily. Drinking water recommended by the local shepherd!

name: Monte da Pia Camping
title: (6230) Monte da Pia Camping
description:
Please note. I can not listen to voice messages or call you back if I miss your call.
Please send a text using WhatsApp, Signal or on Google maps for a speedy response. 

Small farm with shady olives, orange trees, goats, chickens and other farmyard animals. Hook-ups for campers and a small number of  secluded spots for tents.

5 minutes off tarmac and good access for articulated vehicles from the west.

Private property no guest without permission. 

There is wild swimming on site and we are 20 minutes from a lovely river.  The local village has a great bakery, small general stores and bars. Please ring ahead to check availability. 

See us on Google maps.

There is a restaurant in vale da Prazeres. If you would prefer to eat in Corticada please book 1 day in advance.

2 corner shops 5 mins
Supermarkets 25 minute drive

Campers on foot can walk from the station

title: (6270) Cabeça -
description: On the same road to Piodao, a viewpoint with spectacular views, surrounded by nature, but without any service. We spent the night alone, but super quiet, and a sky with thousands of stars. Highly recommended.

title: (6270) Valezim - Rua do Bairro das Cortes
title_short: (6270) Valezim - Rua do Bairro das Cortes
description: Nice large parking for the church under the mighty large trees. Drinking water available but currently not in use.

title: (6290) - N232
description: On a small road side road Beautiful view of the valley and the Serra Ideal for lunch break or spend the night in nature

title: (6320) Sortelha - Unnamed Road
description: Do you want to spend a night at a charming place? You are going to have hallucinations and you can also make visits

title: (6270) Cabeça -
description: Magnificent spot between Piodao and Loriga in the Sa Serra Estrella natural park.Small dirt road but passable and flat.Small area to land ideally located a few steps from a viewpoint and the sunset. ATTENTION place cleaned by my little hands (gloved) because really very dirty, full of toilet paper so please keep this place clean for the following because the spots are rare in this sector.

title: (6225) Casegas -
description: Quiet night next to a beautiful river where you can swim during the day. No services. Just you and nature.

title: (6320-125) - Casteleiro
description: New Motorhome area, 5€ includes electricity. Very quiet place, near the road but with almost no trafic.

title: (6270) Seia - 4-16 Rua de Santana
description: Parking of the bread museum (pão?). Many places, no service, slightly sloping, very quiet, free, there is another car park just below. It's pretty and lined with a small wood. !!WARNING!! Access can be complicated because the road is very steep and some turns very tight !! We went in 1st and with good brakes with Citroën jumper well loaded ..

name: CamperCamping Alpedrinha
title: (6230-063) CamperCamping Alpedrinha
description: Beautiful place in a beautiful natural peaceful setting. Located in the interior of Portugal. They cultivate Aloe Vera barbadensis on the farm. Location fenced. Nice views in different places. Well worth a visit

address.street: Quinta do Ribeira Termas da Touca

title: (6230-781) Vale de Prazeres - Rua central N9A Catrão
title_short: (6230-781) Vale de Prazeres - Rua central N9A Catrão
description: Quiet and safe private place, in a farm, surrounded by fruit trees, in a small village called Catrão. there is a bar which also does a grocery store 200 meters away, and another less than 700 meters away. The city (Fundao) is 25 minutes away. There is a river beach 20 minutes away. Access to the land by a small path, vehicles maximum 6 meters. Please call me by phone or WhatsApp, but I could only answer you by WhatsApp.

title: (6230) Castelo Novo - 1 Estrada da Santa da Senhora do Convento
title_short: (6230) Castelo Novo - 1 Estrada da Santa da Senhora do Convento
description: Public summer swimming-pool on river. With small park bu near the village. With monuments and caste.

address.street: 1 Estrada da Santa da Senhora do Convento

title: (6270) São Romão -
description: This is the public park of a supermarket. Grocery shopping right next door. Calm, quiet and safe place (cctv in the parking and police nearby) to spend the night. Perfect place to have breakfast and buy some local cheeses and wines.

title: (6230) Castelo Novo - Rua Castelo do Velho
title_short: (6230) Castelo Novo - Rua Castelo do Velho
description: Large flat car park at the top of Castelo Novo historic village (it belongs to their route). No services except a fountain. Very quiet place to spend the night, ideal to visit this beautiful village and watch the sun rising.

title: (6270-644) Vila Cova à Coelheira - N1 Rua da Carreira
title_short: (6270-644) Vila Cova à Coelheira - N1 Rua da Carreira
description: River beach with bar almost always open. Next to the bar there is a tree-lined area where it is possible to stay for free. The area is very nice and quiet.

title: (6300) - EM619
description: Place in the countryside, in a steep path ... very isolated, but I get the 4g ... I can surf the internet .... for info I come from Guarda, where I could find gas bottles camping gas 907 for my T4, close to Decathlon ...

title: (6270) Seia - 22 Avenida Dona Alexandrina F. Albergaria
title_short: (6270) Seia - 22 Avenida Dona Alexandrina F. Albergaria
description: nice quiet spot - very close to town center. Good leveling.

title: (6270) Seia - 9 Avenida Doutor Sebastião Costa
description: Great free parking with superb views

title: (6290) Folgosinho - Caminho Natural
description: Parking next to the road. Space for three or four cars. Beautiful view of the valley and picknick tables and fresh mountain water available. Stayed here for the night without problems, barely any cars pass by.

title: (6270) Sazes da Beira - EM514-1
description: Great place for the night next to the football field. Not suitable for large motorhomes. Nice view all around. Quiet night, we saw no one or heard.

title: (6270) Seia - 33 Rua da Esplanada dos Combatentes da Grande Guerra
title_short: (6270) Seia - 33 Rua da Esplanada dos Combatentes da Grande Guerra
description: Roadside parking with a lovely view. Relatively busy road, on an incline. There are public toilets about 50m along the road.

address.street: 33 Rua da Esplanada dos Combatentes da Grande Guerra

title: (6285) - N338
description: Place next to or on the ground floor to rest or spend the night

title: (6270) Seia - 50 Rua Primeiro de Dezembro
description: Free park close to the city hall. Perfect to visit the city and even to spend the night. Close street with little traffic.

title: (6290) São Paio - Unnamed Road
description: Drinking water

title: (6270) Seia - Rua Doutora Ester da Cunha Barata
title_short: (6270) Seia - Rua Doutora Ester da Cunha Barata
description:
Oficial place for motorhomes without services. 
Prohibited on wednesday because of street Market.

address.street: Rua Doutora Ester da Cunha Barata

title: (6270-481) Seia - 86 Avenida Doutor Afonso Costa
description: Only parking

title: (6290) - Largo Professor Pires das Neves
description: Small picnic area very nice with barbecues and access to water Possibility to spend the night but provide wedges because the terrain is sloping Avoid vehicles too long Very little passage, quiet place

title: (6270-448) Seia - 4 Rua da Castanheira
description: Small car park and AC, 3 or 4. Tiled, without services, 900 m to the center but uphill. Next to Repsol gas station
